description.english: You've entered the world of the book, slowly grasping everything within.
The gunslinger with a merciful heart.
Listen, it's speaking.
description.schinese: 听完所有恶魔之书的低语

description.english: I am the Booksmith, the measure of all things.
description.schinese: 我是书匠,我是万物的尺度.

description.english: Order is chaos.
Desire is rationality.
Unity is division.
Both body and soul collapse together.
Pain, it's too much to bear!
I'm not crazy, I'm not! Hahaha~
description.schinese: 我没疯,我没疯哈哈哈哈~

description.english: I'm just so elated!
I just love working so much!
I'm waiting for three 7s, what are you waiting for?
I'm caught in a loop! Hehehehehehe!
The hole hides the truth, did you know?
You're brutal, "Id" love it.
I deserve time more than you do.
Hahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!
description.schinese: 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈!

description.english: The truth is concealed within repetition.
You've killed the dragon; it can no longer wreak havoc.
description.schinese: 你杀死了龙,它再也无法作恶了

description.english: He saw you and determined your fate.
description.schinese: 他看到了你,规定了你的命运

description.english: Sometimes, submitting to the dragon might not be a bad idea.
description.schinese: 有时候服从于龙,未尝不好

description.english: Everything is one with me.
It's filled with rage.
Greed often isn't a good thing.
description.schinese: 贪婪往往不是一件好事

description.english: Did you think you could escape?
Gamblers often feel certain of victory before placing their bets.
description.schinese: 赌徒在下注之前,往往已经有了胜利的把握

description.english: Aim better, oh master of outlining.
You're caught in the web of fate.
Your hands are stained with the blood of the innocent.
description.schinese: 你已经沾满无辜者的血

description.english: Having 100 bullets in gun. I'm always fully prepared.
description.schinese: 枪里拥有100枚子弹，我永远做好万全的准备

description.english: Carrying a wrench as an electrician makes sense, right?
description.schinese: 作为一个电工,我随身携带扳手应该很合理吧

description.english: I've got it memorized.
Throwing away the watermelon.
Human hearts can be more wicked than demons.
Everything that once was is happening again.
description.schinese: 曾经的一切,再次发生了

description.english: The child escaped, and so did you.
description.schinese: 孩子逃出来了,你也逃出来了

description.english: Faith brings redemption.
Doesn't every mother wish for her child's safety?
description.schinese: 母亲何尝不希望她的孩子平安无事呢?

description.english: For their own desires, they made our winters feel like hell.
description.schinese: 他们为了私欲,让我们的每个冬天都像炼狱

description.english: I'm so tired.
A ghost realm unknown to all, is it connected?
description.schinese: 这里是无人知晓的鬼域,它是联通的?

description.english: I am your child.
Drip, drop, drip, drop.
Her wings caught fire, and my flames went out.
description.schinese: 她的翅膀烧着了,我的火焰扑灭了

description.english: You should listen closely.
A common prop in horror movies.
You are filled with determination.
To earn the gratitude of a child.
As Nietzsche said.
Running doesn't always mean fear, right?
Why do you keep eating?
Don't come any closer to me!
Ahhhhhhhh! Still can't summon her.
description.schinese: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊!也召唤不出来

description.english: This isn't the right time.
I'm moving ahead, is there a problem?
description.schinese: 我往前走,有什么问题吗?

description.english: Fashion is cyclical.
Why are you clicking on this?
Fatten up and then slaughter
At least you tried
Unstoppable dance steps
The confrontation of mysticism
Start and finish what you do
The clothes on your body make you certain that you are a doctor
description.schinese: 身上的衣服让你确定你是一名医生

description.english: Awaken the doctor's nature
Running inside the hospital is a very dangerous thing
description.schinese: 在医院内奔跑是件很危险的事

description.english: A parent's deep love and affection for their child
It's better to find another time
Feeling of lightness and freedom
Hospitals need to be kept clean and tidy at all times
description.schinese: 医院需要时刻保持干净整洁

description.english: A new life is born in you
description.schinese: 一个新的生命在你身上诞生

description.english: Being manipulated and controlled
Innocent yet wrong choice
I will pledge my loyalty to you
A stage for two
Staying up late is harmful to health
The mirror reflects you and something else
description.schinese: 镜子能照出你，可能还有些别的东西

description.english: Remember your identity
Unbearable past
Inescapable cycle of reincarnation
A desperate act with no way out
The next sacrifice
Leaving unscathed, yet the threat remains
description.schinese: 全身而退，然而威胁仍在

description.english: Complete purification
Perhaps in the future, you will be watched over by the gods
description.schinese: 也许今后你会获得神明的注视

description.english: When you are served on the dining table
description.schinese: 当你被端上餐桌的时候

description.english: The hotel welcomes a new master
description.schinese: 酒店迎来了一位新主人

description.english: The fire that once ended everything
You shouldn't be here now
description.schinese: 你现在不应该在这里出现

description.english: Next time, at least not in front of him
description.schinese: 下次至少不要当着他的面

description.english: Arachnophobia
Stampede at the fire scene
Unusual plea for help
The wrong path
Truth lies within lies.
Leaping through narrow death.
I've shrunk myself!
Driving through clouds and mist
description.schinese: 身忽飘飘，如驾云雾，已到壁上

description.english: Rumors gallop among fools.
"I died where the monster was born!"
Yes, this is also a water monkey!
The white crane kills those beyond saving.
Sorry, I'm too hungry.

displayName.english: Buried in the belly of a fish

description.english: Thank you, please die for a moment.
When fear rolls down the snowy mountain.
There's nothing inside the fog, absolutely nothing!
description.schinese: 雾里面没有东西，什么也没有！

description.english: Don't touch my paper person!
The white crane falls in every dream.
description.schinese: 白鹤在每一个梦中坠落

description.english: You lost all your memory in the lake
Passing Through the Silver Key Gate
Mad Mountain Range
Bad news from the fitness club, the dead coach has made another achievement
description.schinese: 健美圈传来噩耗，死亡教练又创佳绩

description.english: They are the shadows of the past, the lingering obsession
description.schinese: 他们是过去的残影，是徘徊的执念

description.english: Friend, I’m really good at being a person
When in doubt, bomb it
He is the dead god. He is the new god
description.schinese: 他是死去的神，是新生的神。

description.english: Human Orange Juice Project
I’m not human anymore, JOJO!
Steroids are running through my veins!
description.schinese: 我的血管里流淌的都是类固醇呀！

description.english: The magnetic field contains one hundred thousand horsepower!
